txt.en: This gold-dust sparkles pleasantly and will make an excellent glitter
This sap will make an excellent glue
This paper will make an excellent card

Ailward Chubb is confused as to why four dwarves have recently left the Inn League without so much as a word. He does not know it, but you harassed them on behalf of the Ale Association. You should make reparations if you wish to do your duty to the Inn League.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>

'Why, hello. You're that mean [placeholder] that hurt my poor friend Grímar's feelings. Are you back to spread the nasty message of the Ale Association?

'No, I see that you represent the Inn League this time. Odd, but I am glad for it. Grímar is very shaken by how abominably you treated him, but I think he would like some encouragement to join with the hobbits' society again.

'All right. I've decided you're trustworthy again. But Grímar gets awfully stuck in his bad moods. Hmm...I know what will cheer him up! A nice hand-made card -- something creative. Do you think you could do that for him?'

Ingredients for a hand-crafted card can be found inside of Gondamon and in the wilds just outside the dwarf-waypost.\n\nYou should collect scrap paper, gold-dust from an ore-deposit, and sap from a pine tree which will serve as glue.

'Look, Grímar! A hand-crafted card, just for you! See how it sparkles? It is made with real gold!'

Ísólfur turns his attention back to you.

'I do believe he likes it, [placeholder]. Thank you for coming to cheer him up. He hasn't been the same dwarf since that day you chastised him so harshly.'
A good, sturdy crafting table can be found in Gondamon.\n\nYou should use the crafting table to assemble the glitter, glue, and paper into a nice card for Grímar.
Grímar and Ísólfur are waiting in Gondamon.\n\nYou should deliver Grímar's cheer-up card to Ísólfur.
'I'm sure you can find all of the materials for a hand-crafted card around Gondamon, if you know where to look.'
Collect shavings of gold-dust from an ore-deposit
Collect sap from a pine tree
Use a craft-table of Gondamon to assemble your card
